Label: XML
Comment: "Does not currently support 083 ""Enhanced voice services"", New Zealand direct service\nnumbers and 050 ""Nation-Wide Service""."

Label: XML_PREMIUM_RATE
Comment: "The ITU doc says the lengths are 9 to 11, but wikipedia says 8. Online numbers can only\nbe found with lengths 8 and 9. 7 digit 'Nation-Wide Service' numbers are also included\nhere."

Label: XML_TOLL_FREE
Comment: "These are the toll free patterns used, by Telecom and Telstra/Clear, but they are\nreferred to as 'Value-added service' in the phone plan for some reason. 85 numbers are\nnot covered, as telecom companies don't seem to support them yet."
